description: Write what is described (putting a leading zero on numbers which have an odd number of digits).
example: a(123130415)=3335 since it should be read as 01.23.13.04.15, i.e. zero 1's followed by two 3's followed by one 3 followed by zero 4's followed by one 5.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 20 2000
